channel.title: Thoughts on Zach Bouzan Kaloustian
channel.description: Recent content in Thoughts on Zach Bouzan Kaloustian

item.title: Find Wow
item.description: Find wow! In the past week I had two experiences that gave me chills. One way at a free exhibit and another at a Broadway show. The African photos Stillness to find wow in everyday life. Put away your phone to find it. Find it in everyday circumstances, like the work of a great teammate or the love of your partner.
